274  // This function is a (slow) way to set properties on the widget, no matter what type it is.
275  // When the requested property doesn't exist in the widget then the functions will return false.
277  virtual bool setProperty(std::string property, const std::string& value);
278 
281  // This function is a (slow) way to get properties of the widget, no matter what type it is.
282  // When the requested property doesn't exist in the widget then the functions will return false.
284  virtual bool getProperty(std::string property, std::string& value) const;
